name: Covid-19 Tracking
detail: Covid-19 tracking with cases number, chart, news, map and basic information.

name: The Fight Club
detail: As gamers we wanted to create a game that we could play with our friends and share with others so they could play with their friends. We drew inspiration from a simple youtube video that showed how to create a multiplayer game in a browser then to decided to take the multiplayer aspect and make a Mortal Kombat style game. We wanted the ability for players to be able to track their score and save their scores to see who can achieve the highest score out of our friends.

name: Password Generator
detail: This application generates a random password based on user-selected criteria. It will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by your JavaScript code.

name: Employee Directory
detail: An employee directory with React by breaking up the application's UI into components, manage component state, and respond to user events.

name: Eat-Da Burger
detail: A burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and ORM. I use Node and MySQL to query and route data in the app, and Handlebars to generate the HTML.

name: Note Taker
detail: An application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes by using an express backend and save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.

name: Workout Tracker
detail: A workout tracker by using Mongo database with a Mongoose schema and handle routes with Express.

name: Employee Tracker
detail: An interfaces that make it easy for bussiness owner to view and interact with information stored in databases. by using node, inquirer, and MySQL.

name: Readme Generator
detail: A command-line application that generates a professional README.md from a user's input using the Inquirer package to help the user create a quality README with information about user's application for quick and easy generation of a project README to get started quickly.

name: Employee Generator
detail: A Node CLI that takes in information about employees and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person using the Inquirer package and jest for running the provided tests.
